name: context-efficiency-toolkit

author: L3DigitalNet

commands.name: review-context-efficiency
commands.description: Run a five-stage structured audit of a plugin against twelve context efficiency principles. Produces findings, consequence maps, remediation options, an implementation plan, and executes approved changes.
